lead_paragraph: Hundreds of thousands gathered in central Seoul to call for Park Geun-hye’s resignation after a scandal involving an unofficial adviser.
snippet: Hundreds of thousands gathered in central Seoul to call for Park Geun-hye’s resignation after a scandal involving an unofficial adviser....

headline.main: South Koreans Rally in Largest Protest in Decades to Demand President’s Ouster
headline.print_headline: South Koreans Demand ‘Surrender’ Of President in Largest Protest in Years
